overview_of_class: Experimental techniques of modern organic chemistry emphasizing chemical separations, spectroscopic characterization, and reactions such as amide synthesis, Grignard reaction, aldol condensation, Robinson annulation, and Diels-Alder reaction.
name: Organic Chemistry Lab II
title: WCAS CHEM 230-3-33 Organic Chemistry Lab II
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 210-3.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Experimental techniques of modern organic chemistry emphasizing chemical separations, spectroscopic characterization, and reactions such as amide synthesis, Grignard reaction, aldol condensation, Robinson annulation, and Diels-Alder reaction.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Chemistry 230-3 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 210-3.

Prerequisite: Student must earn a grade of C- or better in Chemistry 210-2 and Chemistry 230-2.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Turning Technologies Model QT or NXT "Clicker" and associated license
2. 100% Cotton Laboratory Coat
3. Approved Laboratory Goggles or Safety Glasses

For items 2 and 3, sales details will be announced ahead of the first week of class.

subject: CHEM
